marklogic.body: I'm one of those parents that gives my kid a ride to school when I have time in the morning before I go to work. Not because of the rain or Cold or waiting for the bus -- he's a big boy who can handle those things. LOL!! I just like having some one on one time with him. He's got Tae kwon do 3-4 days a week, his band activities, his friends, my husband & I both work, etc. Sometimes as a parent you have to Slice out a little time when you can! But I can see your point, too many parents coddle their kids. Those kids are going to have rude awakening in the real world where everyone doesn't think they are so "special".
